articles.title: New Android malware family has infected thousands of devices - here's what we know - TechRadar
articles.description: More than a dozen Android apps found carrying Xamalicious malware
articles.content:
Cybersecurity researchers from McAfee hae uncovered over a dozen malicious apps lurking in the Google Play Store. 
The researchers claim these apps were carrying a potent piece of malware, capable o… [+1852 chars]
